bill_title: make an appropriation to reimburse counties for the cost of the 2008 presidential primary.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to reimburse counties for the cost of the 2008 presidential primary. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the state general fund the sum of four hundred fifty thousand dollars ($ 450,000 ), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the secretary of state to reimburse counties as full and complete state payment for the cost of the 2008 presidential primary. Any claim made against the money appropriated by this section shall be submitted to the secretary of state by June 1, 2008, and shall be paid by the secretary of state by June 30, 2008. Section 2. The secretary of state shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2008, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
